name: fixts
description: CLI tool to normalize filenames and folders with timestamps to a consistent format

scripts.verify: npm run lint; LINT_CODE=$?; npm run test; TEST_CODE=$?; npm run test:integration; INT_CODE=$?; echo ''; echo '===== VERIFICATION SUMMARY ====='; [ $LINT_CODE -eq 0 ] && echo '✅ Lint: PASS' || echo '❌ Lint: FAIL'; [ $TEST_CODE -eq 0 ] && echo '✅ Unit Tests: PASS' || echo '❌ Unit Tests: FAIL'; [ $INT_CODE -eq 0 ] && echo '✅ Integration Tests: PASS' || echo '❌ Integration Tests: FAIL'; exit $(($LINT_CODE + $TEST_CODE + $INT_CODE))
scripts.verify:quick: npm run lint && npm run test
